DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study test personalize mobile phone-based physical activity intervention among staff member University California , Berkeley . Most physical fitness application smartphones activity tracker use constant goal number step day . However , step goal dynamically adjust accord past behavior , correspond goal may encourage individual increase physical activity level . This study consist randomize controlled trial assess efficacy two different algorithm calculate personalized goal number step day .
